name: StructuredExtraction
description: Production DS5 structured extraction for public corpus (real schema/output)

examples.question: Extract the three basic components of RiskMetrics as a JSON list.

components: A set of market risk measurement methodologies outlined in this document.
Data sets of volatility and correlation data used in the computation of market risk.
Software systems developed by J.P.Morgan, subsidiaries of Reuters, and third party vendors

gold_citations.quote: set of tools that enable participants in the financial markets to estimate their exposure to market risk under what has been called the “Value-at-Risk framework”. examples.question: Extract the Geometric Brownian Motion (GBM) SDE parameters mentioned in the definition as JSON.

gold_citations.quote: the randomly varying quantity follows a Wiener Process with drift. A stochastic process St is said to follow a GBM if it satisfies the following stochastic differential equation: dSt = μStdt + σStdWt (1) where Wt is a Wiener Process, μ is the drift, and σ is the volatility.
